Participants.evidence: a convenience sample of 78 nurses and 156 patients—comprising 78 participants before the administration of the reference guide and another 78 participants after its provision—from the general surgery units at Mansoura University Hospital.

Intervention.evidence: a reference guide tailored to nursing staff providing bariatric surgery care.

Objective.evidence: the present study aimed to develop and implement a reference guide tailored to nursing staff providing bariatric surgery care.

Result_Outcome.evidence: the percentage of nurses who exhibited good knowledge of bariatric surgery increased from 10.3% to 80.8%.
